name: Senior WPF Developer (remote)
description:
Altium is a software company that provides PCB electronics design software for engineers, such as Altium Designer and Altium 365. The company has been a technological leader in developing unified PCB solutions over the past 30 years.

Currently, we are looking for a talented Senior WPF Developer.

Skills:

  • 5+ years of recent GUI development experience in WPF and/or UWP with solid C#/.NET skills.
  • Experience with desktop WPF, Blend, and/or DevExpress WPF Control Library, MVVM pattern.
  • Knowledge of UI/UX design principles and data visualization to create a polished, intuitive user experience is strongly desired.
  • Ability to design and implement visually compelling screens using Blend/XAML including custom control templates, Dynamic Resources, Theming, etc.
  • Experience with Dependency Injection using Unity or other DI frameworks.
  • Solid understanding and experience with software design and architecture patterns.
  • Ability to architect efficient and reusable software abstractions.
  • Experience with the Task asynchronous programming model.
  • Comprehensive understanding of algorithms, data structures, distributed systems, and concurrency topics.


Opportunities:

Opportunity to solve real-life engineering problems in the really exciting electronics design industry.

In Altium, you can expect:

  • Distributed development team
  • Products popular in the field of microelectronics
  • Participation in specialized conferences, meetings - both as participants and speakers
  • Flexible work schedule (the working day from about 11 to 20);
  • The opportunity to work remotely. In the future - you can work remote or join a team in one of the comfortable offices in the city center (Moscow or St.Petersburg)
  • “White” salary in $USD
  • Corporate English courses, Medical insurance, payment of meals;
